species.description: The species of the Iris flower

value_dict.setosa: Setosa is a species of Iris flower
value_dict.versicolor: Versicolor is a species of Iris flower
value_dict.virginica: Virginica is a species of Iris flower

elevation.description: The elevation of the location where the flower was found (in meters)

soil_type.description: The type of soil where the flower was found

sepal_length.description: The length of the sepal of the flower (in cm)

sepal_width.description: The width of the sepal of the flower (in cm)

petal_length.description: The length of the petal of the flower (in cm)

petal_width.description: The width of the petal of the flower (in cm)

sepal_area.description: The area of the sepal of the flower (in square cm)

petal_area.description: The area of the petal of the flower (in square cm)

sepal_aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the sepal (length/width)

petal_aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the petal (length/width)

sepal_to_petal_length_ratio.description: The ratio of the sepal length to the petal length

sepal_to_petal_width_ratio.description: The ratio of the sepal width to the petal width

sepal_petal_length_diff.description: The difference between the sepal length and the petal length

sepal_petal_width_diff.description: The difference between the sepal width and the petal width

petal_curvature_mm.description: The curvature of the petal (in mm)

petal_texture_trichomes_per_mm2.description: The texture of the petal measured as the number of trichomes per square millimeter

leaf_area_cm2.description: The area of the leaf (in square cm)

sepal_area_sqrt.description: The square root of the sepal area

petal_area_sqrt.description: The square root of the petal area

area_ratios.description: The ratio of different areas of the flower

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in botany.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the Iris flower, please predict the species.
